snippet.title: Dumbriel Magnificent Adventure In Hell - Official Trailer | The MIX Showcase October 2023
snippet.description: Join members of the development team at MadMoa for a behind-the-scenes look at Dumbriel: Magnificent Adventure in Hell, an upcoming action-adventure Soulslike Metroidvania game. The team also showcases a peek at gameplay, including combat and more. Dumbriel will be available on PC (via Steam and Epic Games Store).
